GS24paribhsu:227: 'dāmahāyanāntācca' ityādau 'saṅkhyāvyayādeḥ' ityataḥ saṅkhyāderityanuvartate 'vyayāderiti nivṛttamiti cānupapannamata āha-
GS24paribhsu:229_1: iti 'pakṣāttiḥ' iti sūtre kaiyaṭaḥ / tāvanmātrāṃṣe svaritatvapratijñābalāllabhyamidam /
GS24paribhsu:229_2: spaṣṭā ceyam 'dāmahāyanāntācca' iti sūtre 'auto 'mśasoḥ' iti sūtre ca bhāṣye pūrvā
GS24paribhsu:233: jātipakṣeṇaprāptam,guṇābhedakatvenaca prāptam, netyarthaḥ/ ata evāṇuditsūtre pratyayā'deśā'gameṣu
GS24paribhsu:234: prakārāntareṇoktvā, 'evaṃ tarhi siddhe yadapratyaya iti pratiṣedhaṃ śāsti,
GS24paribhsu:236: iti/ kiñca, 'jyāda īyasaḥ' ityevāntaryato dīrghe siddhe 'jyādāt' iti dīrgoccāraṇamasyā jñāpakam/ aṇuditsūtre 'jyādāt' iti sūtre ca bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:241: nanvevam 'adaso 'seḥ' ityādinā 'amū' ityādau dīrgavidhānaṃ na syādata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:243: 'diva ut' 'ṛta ut' iti taparakaraṇamasyā jñapakam/ 'titsvaritam' iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭaiṣā//
GS24paribhsu:244: nanu 'gave hitaṃ gohitam' ityādau pratyayalakṣaṇenāvādyādeśāpattirata āha
GS24paribhsu:246: varṇaprādhānyaviṣayametat/ tatvaṃ ca 'pratyayalope' iti sūtre sthānivadityanuvṛtyaiva siddhe
GS24paribhsu:249: pratyayanirūpitaniśeṣyatārūpaṃ ca/ tena 'gohitam' ityādau avādi na,
GS24paribhsu:250: 'citrāyāṃ jātā citrā' ityādāvaṇyo 'kārastadantān ṅīp ca na/ iyamalvidhau sthānivatvāprāptāvapi prāptapratyayalakṣaṇavidherniṣedhiketi spaṣṭaṃ
GS24paribhsu:252: nanu 'ataḥ kṛkami' ityatra kami grahaṇe siddhe, kaṃsagrahaṇaṃ vyartham,
GS24paribhsu:255: idamevāsyā jñāpakamiti kaiyaṭādayaḥ/ kaṃsestu na, kaṃso
GS24paribhsu:257: bhāṣye vyutpannānītyapi/ idaṃ śākaṭāyanarītyā/ pāṇinestvavyutpattipakṣa eveti śabdendu śekhare nirūpitam/”āyaneyī”iti sūtre bhāṣye spuṭametat//
GS24paribhsu:261: yogo vibhajyate/ gṛhyamāṇa upatiṣṭata iti śeṣaḥ/ tena tadādyantāṃśaḥ siddhaḥ/ tadantāṃśastu”yenavidhiḥ”ityanena siddhaḥ/ sa ca śabdarūpaṃ
GS24paribhsu:262: viśeṣyamādāya viśeṣyāntarāsatve/ yattu pratyayena svaprakṛtyavayavakasamudāyākṣepāt tadviśeṣaṇatvena tadantavidhiriti/ tat,
GS24paribhsu:266: evaṃ yatrāpi pañcamyantātparaḥ pratyaya ātrīyate, ratrāpi
GS24paribhsu:268: eva”eṅhrasvāt”iti sūtre eṅantādityarthalābhaḥ/ asyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāntaram, 'yenavidhiḥ' ityatra, bhāṣya uktam, 'paramagārgyāyaṇaḥ'
GS24paribhsu:271: vṛttirbhavatyeva/ atra cedaṃ bhāṣyameva mānamityanyatra vistaraḥ/
GS24paribhsu:272: pratyayamātragrahaṇe eṣā, na tu, pratyayāpratyayagrahaṇa iti”ugitaśca”iti
GS24paribhsu:273: sūtre bhāṣye/ iyamaṅgasaṃjñā sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭā//
GS24paribhsu:274: yena vidhiriti sūtre bhāṣya etadghaṭakatadantāṃśasyāpavādaḥ paṭhyate :-
GS24paribhsu:276: yatra pañcamyantātparaḥ pratyayaḥ kāryāntaravidhānāya parigṛhyate, tatra
GS24paribhsu:277_1: dhātutakārasya na natvam / tadantetyaṃśānupasthitāvapi tadādītyaṃśasyopasthitau repha-dāntātparasya
GS24paribhsu:278_1: syāditi 'dṛṣattīrṇaḥ' ityādau doṣaḥ syādeva /”syatāsī ḷluṭoḥ”ityādau ḷluṭoḥ parayorityarthe
GS24paribhsu:278_3: 'ṅyābhyaḥ' ityādau tu na doṣaḥ, tatra kasmāditi niyatāvadhyākāṅkṣāyā abhāvena pañcamyantasya
GS24paribhsu:279: aṅga saṃjñā sūtre tu tadādeḥ pratyaye para ityarthe pañcamyantasya viśeṣaṇatvaṃ spaṣṭameva/ ata eva”uttamaikābhyām” ityādi nirdeśāḥ saṅgacchante//
GS24paribhsu:280: nanvevam 'kumārī brāmhaṇīrūpā' ityādau 'gharūpa' iti hrasvāpattirata āha:-
GS24paribhsu:283: ghañantam, anabhighānāt/ iyaṃ ca 'hṛdayasya' iti sūtra eva bhāṣye spaṣṭā//
GS24paribhsu:288: viṣayasaptamīyam/ yaḥ strīpratyayaḥ striyaṃ prādhānyenā'ha tatra tadādiniyamo na, yastvaprādhānyenā'ha tatra tadādiniyamo 'styevetyarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:289: pratyāsatyā yasya samudāyastrīpratyayāntatvamāneyaṃ tadarthaṃ pratyanupasarjanatvamevaitatparibhāṣāpravṛttau nimittam/ tena
GS24paribhsu:290: 'atirājakumāriḥ' ityādau rājakumārīśabdārthasyātiśabdārthaṃ pratyupasarjanatve 'pi tadarthaṃ pratyanupasarjanatvāt tadādāniyamābhāvena
GS24paribhsu:291: hrasva siddhiḥ/ ata evātra paribhāṣāyāṃ na śāstrīyamupasarjanatvam,
GS24paribhsu:293: sambandhena strīpratyayasāmānyagrahaṇe tadviśeṣagrahaṇe ca pravṛttiḥ, na tu strīpratyayāstrīpratyayagrahaṇe/ dhvanitañcedam 'arthavat'
GS24paribhsu:294: sūtre bhāṣye/ iyaṃ ca vācanikyeva/ 'ṣyaṅaḥ' iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭā//
GS24paribhsu:295: nanvevam”taraptamapau ghaḥ”ityādinā tarabantādeḥ saṃjñā syādata āha:-
GS24paribhsu:299: 'pi phalābhāva iti vācyam, padasaṃjñāyāḥ 'svādiṣu' iti viṣaye prakṛti
GS24paribhsu:305: asyāśca karmaṇi ktānta uttarapade 'nantaro gatiḥ prakṛtisvara ityarthake
GS24paribhsu:306: 'gatiranantaraḥ' iti sūtre anantara grahaṇaṃ jñāpakam/ taddhi
GS24paribhsu:308: paribhāṣayoddhṛtasya ktāntatvābhāvādeva aprāptau tadvyarthaṃ sadasyā jñāpakam/ na ca 'abhyuddhṛtam' ityādau paratvāt 'gatirgatau' ityanenābhernighāta eveti vācyam, pādādisthatvena,
GS24paribhsu:309: padātparatvābhāvena ca tadaprāpteḥ/ anantaragrahaṇe kṛtetu tatsāmartyād
GS24paribhsu:310: gatyākṣiptadhātunirūpitamevenantaryaṃ gṛhyata iti na doṣaḥ/ na ca 'abhyuddhṛtam' ityādāvabhinā samāse 'nantarasyodaḥ pūrvapadatvābhāve 'pi
GS24paribhsu:311_0: svarārthaṃ taditi vācyam / 'kārakād datta' iti sūtre 'kārakāt' iti yogaṃ vibhajya
GS24paribhsu:311_1: tatra gati grahaṇamanuvartya kārakādeva paraṃ gatipūrvapadaṃ ktāntamantodāttamiti
GS24paribhsu:312: śabdāt tadasamabhivyāhṛtasya kevalasyāpīti tadarthaḥ/ anyathānayā kṛdgrahaṇaviṣaye paratvāt 'pratyayagrahaṇa' paribhāṣāyā bādha eva
GS24paribhsu:313: syādityapi grahaṇam/ ata eva 'sāṅkūṭinam' iti 'gatikārakopapadānām' iti
GS24paribhsu:314: 'kṛdgrahaṇa' iti ca paribhāṣābhyāṃ kṛdantena samāse kṛte viśiṣṭādevāṇi
GS24paribhsu:315: siddhyati, na tu 'saṅkauṭinam' iti 'puṃyogāt' iti sūtre bhāṣyoktaṃ
GS24paribhsu:317: pākṣikadoṣo durvāra eva syāt/ spaṣṭaṃ cedaṃ sarvam”samāse 'nañpūrve”iti
GS24paribhsu:318_0: sūtre bhāṣyakaiyaṭayoḥ / 'gatiranantaraḥ' ityatra tu gateḥ pūrvapadasya ktānta uttarapade
GS24paribhsu:318_1: pare kāryavidhānāttatsamavadhāne 'pi kevalasya ktāntatvena grahaṇaṃ bodhyam / iyaṃ
GS24paribhsu:319: ca, na tu kṛdakṛdgrahaṇa iti/ 'anupasarjanāt' iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam//
GS24paribhsu:320: padāṅgādhikāre tasya ca tadantasya ca // Paribh_28 //
GS24paribhsu:321: padamaṅgaṃ ca viśeṣyaṃ viśeṣaṇena ca tadanta vidhiḥ/ tena 'iṣṭakacitam,
GS24paribhsu:325: ata eva 'taduttarapadasya' iti pāṭho 'yukta iti bhāṣye spaṣṭam/ atra
GS24paribhsu:329: nanvevam 'asyāpatyamiḥ' ityādāvadantaprātipadikābhāvādiñ na syāt, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:331: nimittasadbhāvāt viśiṣṭo 'padeśo mukhyo vyavahāro yasyāsti sa vyapadeśī/
GS24paribhsu:337: 'tta syāt/ ata eva 'hariṣu' ityādau soḥ padatvaṃ na/ loke 'pi
GS24paribhsu:339: kaniṣṭhaḥ, madhyama iti, kintvekaputrasatva eva/ anena
GS24paribhsu:340_0: aśāstrīyasyāpyatideśaḥ / ata eva 'iyāya' ityādāvekāctvanibandhana dvitva siddhiḥ /
GS24paribhsu:340_1: ata eva 'bhavati' ityādau 'bhū' ityasyāṅgatvam, 'iyān' ityādau kāryakālapakṣe taddhitāntatvanibandhanaprātipadikatvañca
GS24paribhsu:344_0: kaiyaṭaḥ, tanna ; tasya 'ekapadā ṛk' ityatra bhāṣyoktarītyā mukhyavyavahāra satvāt /”ekapadā
GS24paribhsu:344_1: ṛk' ityatrārthena yukto vyapadeśaḥ”iti bhāṣye uktam / ṛktvāderarthaśabdobhayavṛttitvena
GS24paribhsu:344_2: tasyāḥ śabdamātrarūpaṃ padameko 'vayava ityartha iti tadāśayaḥ /
GS24paribhsu:350: na caivam 'nijau catvāra ekācaḥ' iti bhāṣyāsaṅgatiḥ,
GS24paribhsu:354: arthabodhakena śabdena vyapadeśisadṛśo bhāvaḥ kāryaṃ labhyata iti
GS24paribhsu:355: tadarthaḥ, prāyo 'sahāya evārthavatvāt/ 'kurute' ityādau taśabdākāro 'cāmantya iti vyavahāre
GS24paribhsu:356: ādiryasyeti vyavahāre cāsahāya eveti tatra vyapadeśivadbhāvena ṭisaṃjñāsiddhirityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:357: nanu gargādibhyo vihita yañ tadanta vidhinā paramagargādibhyo 'pi syāt,
GS24paribhsu:361: vārtikasthapratyayāṃśānuvādaḥ/ ata eva 'yena vidhiḥ' iti sūtra bhāṣye pratyayavidhibhinne”aptṛn”ityādau
GS24paribhsu:363_0: ityādyudāharaṇañca saṅgacchate / ata eva ca tadantavidhisūtre bhāṣye samāsetyādiniṣedhasya
GS24paribhsu:363_1: kathanavadasya na kathanam / so 'pi niṣedho viśiṣya tattadrūpeṇa gṛhītaprātipadikasūtra
GS24paribhsu:367: nanvevam”sūtrāntāṭṭhak” “daśāntāḍḍaḥ” “ekagopūrvāt”ityādeḥ kevala sūtraśabda daśanśabdaikaśabdādiṣvapi pravṛttirvyapadeśivadbhāvāt syāt, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:370: jñāpakam/ na ca”iṣṭādibhyaḥ”iti sūtre 'nuvṛtyarthaṃ tathā pāṭhaḥ, ata evāniṣṭītyādisiddhiriti
GS24paribhsu:373: ata eva”nāntādasaṅkhyādeḥ”iti caritārtham/ anyathā 'pañcamaḥ' ityādāvapi vyapadeśivadbhāvena saṅkhyāditvāt tadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameva/
GS24paribhsu:374: iyaṃ ca prātipadika grahaṇe eva, na tu prātipadikāprātipadikagrahaṇe/
GS24paribhsu:375: tena”ugitaśca”ityatra na doṣa iti tatraiva bhāṣye spaṣṭam/ iyam
GS24paribhsu:378: tena 'ahan' ityādeḥ paramāhanśabde kevalāhanśabde ca pravṛttirityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:379: nanu 'vānto yi' ityādau yādau pratyaya ityarthaḥ katham? ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:381: tadantavidherapavāda iyam/ vācanikyeṣā”yena vidhiḥ”ityatra bhāṣye paṭhitā/
GS24paribhsu:382: asyāśca svarūpasatī saptamī nimittam/ ata eva”neḍvaśi kṛti”ityādau vaśādeḥ kṛta ityādyarthalābhaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:383: iyaṃ ca”ārdhadhātukasyeḍ”iti sūtre valāderityādigrahaṇasāmarthyād viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇayorubhayoḥ saptamyantatva eva pravartate/ tena”ḍaḥ si
GS24paribhsu:390: nyāyasiddheyam/”tiṣyapunarvasvoḥ”iti sūtrasthaṃ bahuvacanasyeti grahaṇamasyā jñāpakam/ taddhīdam”tiṣyapunarvasu”ityatra tadvyāvṛtyartham/
GS24paribhsu:391: na caivamapyatra”jātiraprāṇinām”iti nityaikavadbhāvena bahuvacanābhāvādidaṃ sūtraṃ vyarthamiti vācyam, tadvaikalpikatvasyāpyanena
GS24paribhsu:392: jñāpanāt/ na caite prāṇina iti vācyam,”āpomayaḥ prāṇaḥ”iti
GS24paribhsu:395: ata eva”dvandvaśca prāṇī”ityādeḥ prāṇyaṅgādīnāmeva samāhāra iti
GS24paribhsu:400: sādhitā/ tena”pratīpamanya ūrmiryudhyati”ityādi siddham/ yuddhayata iti prāpnoti//
GS24paribhsu:401: nanu kṣiya ityādāviyaṅ katham? ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:403: kṣiya itīyaṅ nirdeśo 'syā jñāpakaḥ/ tatreva prātipadikatva nibandhana
GS24paribhsu:404: vibhaktikaraṇādanityā ceyamiti”kṣiyo dīrghāt”ita sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam//
GS24paribhsu:405: nanu”rāmau”ityādau vṛddhau kṛtāyāṃ kāryakāla pakṣe kathaṃ padatvam?
GS24paribhsu:409: sutarām/ ata eva tādṛśādarthabodhaḥ, anyathā śaktatāvacchedakaimupūrvyajñānāt tato bodho na
GS24paribhsu:410: evañca rāniti māntasya yasmād vihitastatvam, au ityasya parādivatvena
GS24paribhsu:412: chinnapucche śuni śvatvavyavacahāravanmānte tatvaṃ lokanyāya siddham/ ata
GS24paribhsu:416: etenāyaṃ nyāyaḥ śāstrīyakārya eva śāstrīvikāra evetyapāstam/ vikṛtāvayava nibandhana kārye tu nāyam,
GS24paribhsu:421_0: yatra tvardhaṃ tadadhikaṃ vā vikṛtam, tatra jātivyañjakabhūyo 'vayavadarśanābhāvena
GS24paribhsu:422: lakṣyānurodhānnyāyānāśrayaṇam/ tena 'ābhīyāt ityādi siddhiḥ/ spaṣṭaṃ ca kvacinnyāyāpravṛttiḥ”prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ”ityatra kaiyaṭena darśitetyanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:423: iti śrīnāgeśabhaṭṭaviracite paribhāṣenduśekhare śāstratvasampādanoddeśanāmakaṃ prathamaṃ prakaraṇam//
GS24paribhsu:426: pūrvātparaṃ balavat, vipratiṣedha śāstrāt, pūrvasyaparaṃ bādhakamiti yāvat//
GS24paribhsu:427: nanvevam 'bhindhi' ityatra paratvāt tātaṅā bādhito dhirna syādata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:429: nanvevam 'tisṛṇām' ityatra paratvāt tisrādeśe punastrayādeśaḥ syādata āha
GS24paribhsu:430: sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yad bādhitaṃ tad bādhitameva // Paribh_39 //
GS24paribhsu:431: tatra kvaciccaritārthayorekasmin yugapadubhayoḥ kāryayorasambhavena bādhakābhāvāt paryāyeṇa tṛjādivacchāstra dvayaprasaṅge niyamārtham”vipratiṣedha”sūtramiti sakṛdgatinyāyasiddhiḥ/
GS24paribhsu:432: yathā tulyabalayorekaḥ preṣyo bhavati/ sa tayoḥ paryāyeṇa kāryaṃ karoti,
GS24paribhsu:433: yadā tamubhau yugapat preṣayato nānādikṣu ca kārye tadobhayorna karoti,
GS24paribhsu:436: tatra kṛte yadi pūrvaprāptirasti, tarhi tadapi bhavatyeveti 'punaḥ
GS24paribhsu:438_0: yattu kaiyaṭādayo vyaktau padārthe pratilakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇopaplavādubhayorapi śāstrayostattallakṣyayoracaritārthyena
GS24paribhsu:438_1: paryāyeṇa dvayorapi prāptau parameveti niyamārthamidamiti 'sakṛdgati' nyāyasiddhiḥ /
GS24paribhsu:439_0: jātipakṣe tūddeśyatāvacchedakākrānte kvacillakṣye caritārthayordvayoḥ śāstrayoḥ satpratipakṣanyāyena
GS24paribhsu:440: prasaṅgavijñānasiddhirityāhuḥ, tanna ; vyaktipakṣe sarvaṃ lakṣyaṃ śāstraṃ vyāpnoti na jātipakṣa ityatra mānābhāvāt/
GS24paribhsu:441_1: bhāṣye darśanāt / ata eva”sarūpa”sūtre bhaṣye jātau padārthe 'navayavena sākalyena
GS24paribhsu:442: sakala gavānubandhanāsambhavāt karmaṇo vaiguṇyamuktam/ dravyavāde cāsarvadravyāvagateḥ 'gauranubandhyaḥ' ityādāvekaḥ śāstrokto 'paro
GS24paribhsu:444: kiñca nahi bhāṣyokta tṛjādidṛṣṭāntasya vyaktivakṣa eva sarva viṣayatvam na dātipakṣa ityatra
GS24paribhsu:445: api ca vyaktipakṣe 'pyanyavyaktirūpa viṣayalābhena caritārthayoriyaṃ vyaktivirodhāt svaviṣayakatvaṃ
GS24paribhsu:450: kvacillaukikadṛṣṭāntāśrayaṇamiti bhāṣyasammata mārga eva yukta iti
GS24paribhsu:454: yathā 'śiṣṭāt' ityādau tātaṅśībhāvayoryugapatpravṛttau svasvanimittanantaryāsambhavaḥ/ yadyapi tātaṅādeḥ sthānivadbhavenāsthyeva
GS24paribhsu:455: tat, tathāpyādeśapravṛtyuttarameva saḥ, na tu tatpravṛttikāle/
GS24paribhsu:456_0: evaṃ numtṛjvatvayoḥ 'priyakroṣṭūni' ityādau yugapadasambhavaḥ, yadāgamā ityasya numpravṛtyuttaraṃ
GS24paribhsu:456_2: cāsambhavo bodhyaḥ / numnuṭorapi nuṭyajādivibhaktyānantaryabādhaḥ, numi hrasvantāṅgabādha
GS24paribhsu:457: kvacidiṣṭānurodhena pūrvaśāstre svaritatvapratijñābalāt svaritenādhikaṃ kāryamityarthāt pūrvameva bhavati/ tena sarve pūrva vipratiṣedhāḥ saṅgṛhītā iti”svaritena”iti sūtre bhāṣye/
GS24paribhsu:463: atra”vṛdbhyaḥ syasanoḥ”iti sūtreṇa sye vibhāṣātaṅvidhānaṃ jñāpakam/
GS24paribhsu:464_0: anyathā svavyavadhāne niyamāpravṛttau sāmānya śāstreṇobhayasiddhau vikalpavidhānaṃ
GS24paribhsu:464_1: vyarthaṃ syāt / atrārthe jñapite tu 'sya' iti tatra viṣayasaptamī bodyeti”anudāttaṅitaḥ”ityatra
GS24paribhsu:470: evañca lāvasthāyāṃ sye 'pi tadvyavadhāne taṅsiddhiḥ/ śabādibhyastu pūrvameva niyamaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:471: yadvā lamātrāpekṣatvādantaraṅgā ādeśāḥ, lakāraviśeṣāpekṣatvāt syādayo bahiraṅgā iti digyogalakṣaṇapañcamyāmapi na doṣaḥ/

GS24paribhsu:502: pāṇḍavānāṃ prābalyaṃ vyavaharanti ceti sarvaṃ cedaṃ lakṣyānurodhād vyavasthitam//

GS24paribhsu:506: tatrecchayānyatarattadubhayaṃ vā tasya balavatve niyāmakamullekhyam/ ata eva tatra paratvānnityatvācceti bhāṣye ucyate/
GS24paribhsu:507: vastutastatra paratvādityuktirekadeśinaḥ/ spaṣṭaṃ cedaṃ vipratiṣedha sūtre
GS24paribhsu:508_1: pravṛttau nityatvādityeva bhāṣya uktam / evaṃ nityāntaraṅgayorbalavatvamapi yaugapadyāsambhava

GS24paribhsu:514: bahiraṅgatvam/ ata eva”na tisṛcatasṛ”iti niṣedhaścaritārthaḥ/ anyathā strītvarūpārthanimittakatisrāpekṣayāntaraṅgatvāt trayādeśe tadasaṅgatiḥ
GS24paribhsu:518: etena 'gaudheraḥ, 'paceran' ityādāveyādīnāmaṅgasaṃjñāsāpekṣatvena bahiraṅgatayāsiddhatvād valilopo na syāditi parāstam/
GS24paribhsu:521: tadantavidhau 'syonaḥ' ityatra antaraṅgatvād yaṇo guṇabādhakatvamiṣyate, tanna sidhyet, ūnaśabdamāśritya
GS24paribhsu:522: yaṇādeśaḥ, na śabdhamāśritya guṇa ityantaraṅgatvād guṇa eva syādityuktam/

GS24paribhsu:526: tatra kṛte yaṇ guṇau prapnuta iti/
GS24paribhsu:528: tadantavidhāvapi bahupadārthāpekṣatvarūpa bahiraṅgatvasya guṇe satvena tatra doṣakathanaparabhāṣyāsaṅgateḥ/

GS24paribhsu:533: tvadrītyā tadapi vaktumucitam/ prathamyāt tadeva vā vaktumucitam/ mama tvantaraṅgaparibhāṣayā tadvāraṇāsambhavt tannoktam/
GS24paribhsu:534: kiñca siddhānte nityatvād guṇātpūrvamūṭh, guṇastu yaṇā bādhitatvādanityaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:536: vali lope 'ntaraṅgaparibhāṣā na pravartata iti tu na yuktam/ tatsūtre bhāṣya eva vraścādiṣu
GS24paribhsu:537: naca 'vṛścati' ityādau cāritārthayam, bahiraṅgatayā samprasāraṇasyāsiddhatvena pūrvameva tatprāpteriti
GS24paribhsu:538: yattu nalopasya ṣaṭsaṃjñāyāmasiddhatvāt 'pañca' ityatra”na ṣaṭ”iti niṣedha
GS24paribhsu:540: na lopasyahi padasaṃjñāsāpekṣatvena bahiraṅgatvaṃ vācyam, tacca, na ;
GS24paribhsu:541: saṃjñākṛta bahiraṅgatvasyānāśrayaṇāt/ 'pañca' ityatra niṣedhastu striyāṃ yatprāpnoti, tanneti vyākhyānasāmarthyena bhūtapūrvaṣaṭtvamādāyeti bhodhyam/

GS24paribhsu:549: iye ca tripādyāṃ na pravartate, tripādyā asiddhatvāt/ asyāñca”vāha
GS24paribhsu:550: ūṭh”sūtrasthamūṭh grahaṇaṃ jñāpakamityeṣā sapādasaptādyāyīsthā/ anyathā samprasāraṇamātravidhānena laghūpadhaguṇe”vṛddhi reci”iti vṛddhau
GS24paribhsu:551: 'viśvauhaḥ' ityādisiddhestadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameva/ satyāṃ hyetasyāṃ bahiraṅgasamprasāraṇasyāsiddhatvāllaghūpadhahuṇo na syāt/

GS24paribhsu:562_0: na ca kāryakālapakṣe tripādyāmetatpravṛttirdurvāreti vācyam, pūrvaṃ prati parasyāsiddhatvādantaraṅgābhāvena
GS24paribhsu:563: na cānayā pūrvasyāsiddhatvādabhāvena taṃ prati parāsiddhatvaṃ pūrvatretyanena vaktumaśakyamiti vācyam, evaṃ hi vinigamanāvirahādubhayorapyapravṛttyāpatteḥ/
GS24paribhsu:564: kiñca pūrvatretyasya pratyakṣatvena tenānumānikyā asyā bādha evocitaḥ/

GS24paribhsu:567: ata eva”nigālyate”ityādau latvārtham 'tasya doṣaḥ' iti vacanamevārabdham/

GS24paribhsu:647: nanvevam 'akṣadyūḥ' ityādau bahiraṅgasyoṭho 'siddhatvādantaraṅgo yaṇ na syāt, ata āha :-

GS24paribhsu:674_1: pūrvayaṇādeśaḥ sādhitaḥ / ata evaiṣā bhāṣye punaḥ kvāpi nollikhitā / ata eva antaraṅgaparibhāṣāmupakramya
GS24paribhsu:675_0: bahūni prayojanāni santi, tadarthameṣā paribhāṣākartavyā, pratividheyaṃ ca doṣeṣu'
GS24paribhsu:675_1: ityuktam,”samprasāraṇācca”iti sūtre bhāṣye / pratividhānaṃ ca paribhāṣāviṣaye 'nityatvāśrayaṇameveti
GS24paribhsu:678: lukaṃ bādhitvāntaraṅgatvāddhalṅyādilope numādayaḥ syuḥ, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:679: antaraṅgānapi vidhīn bahiraṅgo lug bādhate // Paribh_52 //
GS24paribhsu:680: atra ca”pratyayottarapadayośca”iti sūtraṃ jñāpakam/ 'tvatkṛtam' ityādau lugapekṣayā antaraṅgatvād
GS24paribhsu:682_0: nanu 'tava putraḥ, tvatputraḥ' ityādau tavamamādibādhamārthaṃ tadāvaśyakamiti cet,
GS24paribhsu:688: iti nyāyenāsiddhavatsūtrasthabhāṣyasammatena maparyantasyaivādeśe siddhe tadanuvṛttirvyattheti vācyam, tasya śnamakajādau vyabhitārāditi cet, na;
GS24paribhsu:689: śnami mitvena, bahuci purastādgrahaṇena, akaci prāk ṭegrahaṇena tasya bādhe 'pyatrotsargasya
GS24paribhsu:696: yadyapi virodhe bādhakatvamiti vārtikamate 'yaṃ nyāyaḥ, bhāṣyakārastu vināpi virodhaṃ satyapi sambhave bādhakatvamicchati,
GS24paribhsu:698: yuṣmakādyā'deśavidhānajñāpita utsargaḥ svīkriyata eveti prakṛte na doṣaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:701: maparyantasyā'deśavidhānārthā/ tatra ca antaraṅgatvāt tvamāvityeva siddhe vyarthā saṃtajjñapikā/ jñāpite tvasminnetadviṣaye tavādīnāmaprāptyā
GS24paribhsu:703: yattu haradattenāntaraṅgapravṛttau pratyaya uttarapade ca maparyantāsambhavena tadanuvṛttirvyarthā satī jñapiketyuktam, tat, na;
GS24paribhsu:705: vastuta idaṃ jñāpakaṃ vārtikarītyaiva, bhāṣyarītyā tu vācanika evāyamartha
GS24paribhsu:708: yāsayoḥ”iti sūtrasthākaraprāmāṇyena lugmātra viṣayā/ ādye 'he trapu'
GS24paribhsu:709: ityādāvanena nyāyena lopaṃ bādhitvā lug bhavatīti bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:710: uktam/ antye 'ntaraṅgāṃśca vidhīn sarvo 'pi lugbādhate, na tu sublugeva/
GS24paribhsu:711: ata eva”sanīsraṃsaḥ”ityādau nalopo na bhavati/ 'pañcabhiḥ khaṭvābhiḥ
GS24paribhsu:712: krītaḥ, pañcakhaṭvaḥ' ityādāvekādeśāt prāgeva ṭāpo luk/ anyathā kṛtaikādeśasya lukyakāraśravaṇaṃ na syāditi kaiyaṭe uktam/
GS24paribhsu:714: 'tyaṅgaḥ' ityatra supoluki bahuvacana paratvābhāvāt “tadrājasya”iti lug na syāditi
GS24paribhsu:715_0: śaṅkāparabhāṣyavyākhyāvasare antaraṅgānapīti nyāyenāyaṃ luk subluko bādhakaḥ syādityāśaṅkya
GS24paribhsu:715_1: subluka evānena balavatvaṃ bodhyata iti tatprauḍhyeti draṣṭavyam / lugapekṣayā luko
GS24paribhsu:716: vaktumaśakyatvāditi tadā śaṅkā samādhānaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam/
GS24paribhsu:723: nyāyena 'ubhayata āśrayaṇe nāntādivat' ityasyābhāvena tadāśrayaṇena vottarapadatve 'pi tasyānackatvādekasyaikādeśena parasya nityena”yasyeti”lopenāpahārāt/
GS24paribhsu:724: na ca parādivadbhāvenaikādeśaviśiṣṭasyottarapadatvamevāstviti tatsambhava iti vācyam; uttarapadādyacsthānikatvād
GS24paribhsu:729: 'nacka indra śabdaḥ sampannastatra kaḥ prasaṅgo vṛddheriti/
GS24paribhsu:730: marudādibhirindrasya dvandve indrasyaiva pūrva nipātaḥ, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:732: atra ca”nendrasya”iti niṣedha eva jñāpaka iti”antādivacca” “vipratiṣedhe
GS24paribhsu:735: nanvevamapi 'pradhāya, prasthāya' ityādāvantaraṅgatvādvitvādiṣu kṛteṣu lyap syādata āha
GS24paribhsu:737: “ado jagdhiḥ”iti sūtre ti kitītyeva siddhe lyabgrahaṇamasyā jñapakamiti”ado jagdhiḥ”ityatra bhāṣye spaṣṭam//
GS24paribhsu:738: nanvevamapi”iyāya”ityādau dvitve kṛte 'ntaraṅgatvāt savarṇadīrghatve tadasiddhirata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:745: na ceyaṅādirapavādaḥ, 'yenanāprāpti' nyāyena 'iyati' ityādisakalalakṣya prāpta yaṇapavādatvasyaiva nirṇayāditi prāñcaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:747: na ca 'iyāya' 'iyeṣa' ityādau caritārtham, tayorapi pūrvapravṛttaguṇasya pūrvapravṛttavṛddheśca
GS24paribhsu:748: “dvirvacaneci”iti rūpātideśenāpahāre dvitve kṛte punaḥ prāpte guṇavṛddhī
GS24paribhsu:752: sāhacaryād vyākhyānācca ṛdhātoreva grahaṇam/ ataḥ ivarṇasyeyaṅityarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:757: antye dvitīyadvirvacanasyaiva satvena tvadukta prayogasyaiva durlabhatvāt/
GS24paribhsu:759: yadyapi bhāṣye 'yadayamabhyāsasyāsavarṇa ityasavarṇagrahaṇaṃ karoti' iti granthenāsavarṇagrahaṇasyaiva jñāpakatā labhyate, tathāpi 'na hyantareṇa guṇavṛddhī asavarṇaparābhyāso
GS24paribhsu:760: bhavati' iti tadupapādana granthena sampūrṇa sūtrasyaiva jñāpakatā
GS24paribhsu:762: agre 'pi 'naitadasti jñāpakam, atyarthametat syāt' ityanena sūtra sārthakyameva darśitam/ asavarṇagrahaṇasyaiva jñāpakatve tu
GS24paribhsu:764: na ca 'akṛtavyūha' paribhāṣayā 'iyeṣa' ityādau savarṇadīrdhāprāptiḥ, yadi
GS24paribhsu:765_0: dīrdhonasyāt, tarhi guṇaḥ syāditi sambhāvanāyāḥ satvena paribhāṣāpravṛtteḥ sūpapādatvāditi
GS24paribhsu:765_1: kathaṃ sampūrṇa sūtrasya jñāpakateti vācyam, tasyā asatvāt / satve vaitadbhāṣyaprāmāṇyena
GS24paribhsu:768: na cāntaraṅgatvād dīrdhopi 'iyāya' ityādau pūrvāntavatvenābhyāsatvādivarṇatvācca ṇalyasavarṇa iyaṅvidhānena sūtraṃ caritārtham/
GS24paribhsu:769: na ca”aci śnu”ityanena siddhiḥ, vṛddhibādhanārthatvāditi vācyam/
GS24paribhsu:774: yattu samānanimittakatvarūpasamānāśrayatva evaiṣeti, tat, na ; jñāpite
GS24paribhsu:778: na caivamapi 'iyāya' ityādāviyaṅ durlabhaḥ, tatra kartavye vṛddhyādeḥ
GS24paribhsu:785: 'iyañcāṅgasambandhinyāṅga eva' iti”svarito vā”iti sūtre bhāṣye/ tatra hi 'kumāryai' ityādo
GS24paribhsu:786: iyañcānityā 'chvoḥ' iti satugnirdeśāt/ anyathāntaraṅgatvāt pūrvaṃ tukaḥ
GS24paribhsu:791: na kṛto viśiṣṭa ūhaḥ -- niścayaḥ, śāstrapravṛttiviṣayo yairityarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:792: bhāvi nimittavināśa ityadyāhāraḥ/ bahiraṅgeṇāntaraṅgasya nimittavināśe paścāt sambhāvite 'ntaraṅgaṃ neti yāvat/
GS24paribhsu:793: atra ca - jñāpakam,”samarthānāṃ prathamāt”iti sūtre samarthānāmiti/ taddhi sūtthitādibhyaḥ
GS24paribhsu:794: kṛtadīrghebhyaḥ pratyayotpatyartham/ anyathāntaraṅgatvād dīrdhe kṛta eva pratyayaprāptyā tadvyarthatā spaṣṭa eva/
GS24paribhsu:795: na cātraikādeśapravṛtti samaye vṛddhyaprāptyaikādeśe kṛta ādeśe vṛddheḥ praptāvapi tannimittavināśābhāva iti vācyam, taddavāraiva
GS24paribhsu:797: na ca sautthitau bahiraṅgatayā vṛddherasiddhatvānna tannimittavināśa iti
GS24paribhsu:798: vācyam, samarthagrahaṇenaitad viṣaye tasyā apravṛtterapi jñāpanāt/
GS24paribhsu:800: tanna, asiddha paribhāṣāyā samakālaprāpta bahiraṅgasya pūrvaṃ jātabahiraṅgasya cāntaraṅge kartavye 'siddhatvaṃ bodhyate, na tu jāte
GS24paribhsu:805: etat pravṛttau ca nimittavināśasambhāvanāpi nimittam/ ata eva 'gomaddaṇḍī'
GS24paribhsu:807: anyathā halṅyādi lopa kāle sāmāsika luko 'prāptyā taduttaraṃ cāpahāryābhāvādaprāptyā lopasyaivāpatteḥ/ asti cātrāpi 'yadi lopo na syāt,
GS24paribhsu:811: anyathā dīrīghābhāve lopasambhāvanayaitatparibhāṣābalāt dīrghāprāptau tadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭamevetyāhuḥ/
GS24paribhsu:814: itiyādāvantaraṅgātpūrvaṃ kṛto 'pīḍāgamo nivartata iti vadan 'na kṛto vyūhaḥ viśiṣṭastarko nimittakāraṇavināśe 'pi kāryasthitirūpo yaiḥ'
GS24paribhsu:817: lokanyāya siddhaścāyamarthaḥ/ tathā hi loke nimittaṃ dvividhaṃ dṛṣṭam--kāryasthito niyāmakaṃ tadaniyāmakaṃ ca/
GS24paribhsu:818: ādyaṃ yathā nyāyanaye 'pekṣā buddhiḥ, tannāśe dvitvanāśābhyupagamāt/
GS24paribhsu:819: vedānti naye prārabdhasya vikṣepasthiti niyāmakatvaṃ ca prasiddhameva/
GS24paribhsu:820: dvitīyaṃ yathā daṇḍādi, tannāśe 'pi ghaṭanāśadarśanāt/ śāstre lakṣyānurodhād vyavasthā/
GS24paribhsu:821: bhāvinimittavināśe pūrvamanutpattau tu na kaścinnyāyaḥnāpi sampratipanno
GS24paribhsu:823: lokasiddhāpūrvatādṛśārthajñapakatve mānābhāva iti tadāśaya iti bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:824: pare tu 'seduṣaḥ' ityādau padāvadhike 'nvākhyāne 'sed vas as' iti sthite iṭ samprasāraṇayoḥ praptau pratipadavidhitvāt pūrvaṃ samprasāraṇe
GS24paribhsu:827_0: yadyapi pratipadavidhitvamanavakāśatve satyeva bādhakatve bījam, tathāpi pūrvapravṛttau
GS24paribhsu:827_1: sāvakāśatve 'pi niyāmakaṃ bhavatyeveti tadāśayaḥ / nirūpitaṃ caitad bahuśaḥ śabdenduśekharādau /
GS24paribhsu:829: ityādāvakṛtasandheḥ pratyayadarśanena sarvatra tathā bhramavāraṇāya nyāyasiddhārthānuvāda
GS24paribhsu:833: kiñca vibhajyānvākhyāne 'su utthita as i' it sthite 'vārṇādāṅgaṃ balīyaḥ'
GS24paribhsu:834: iti prāpta vṛddhi vāraṇāya samarthagrahaṇamityatraiva kaiyaṭe spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:836_0: 'papuṣaḥ' ityādau vasoḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte āto lopo yathā syāt' iti bhāṣye uktam /
GS24paribhsu:836_1: padasya vibhajyānvākhyāne pūrvoktakaiyaṭarītyā pūrvaṃ samprasāraṇe iṭoprāptāvusnimittaka
GS24paribhsu:838: bhāṣyakṛtā ca na pratyākhyātam/ pratyaṅgaṃ antaraṅgam/ asyāṃ paribhāṣāyāṃ satyāṃ tu tadvaiyarthyaṃ
GS24paribhsu:839: ata eva”chvoḥ”iti sūtre 'avaśyamatra tugabhāvārtho yatnaḥ kāryaḥ'
GS24paribhsu:840: antaraṅgatvāddhi tuk prāpnoti' iti bhāṣye uktam/ etatsatve tu tuko
GS24paribhsu:846: kiñcaiṣā bhāṣye na dṛśyate/ taduktam”asiddhavat”sūtre kaiyaṭena
GS24paribhsu:847_1: padasaṃskāra pakṣe 'hariḥ' ityādau visarge kṛte tato gacchatītyādi sambandhe 'hariḥ
GS24paribhsu:847_2: gacchati' ityādyeva sādhu / tadviṣaye padasaṃskārapakṣānāśrayaṇaṃ veti dik //
GS24paribhsu:849: yena nāprāpte yo vidhirārabhyate sa tasya bādhako bhavati // Paribh_57 //
GS24paribhsu:850: prāpta iti bhāve ktaḥ, yena nāprāpta ityasya
GS24paribhsu:856: syādayaḥ prāpnuvantītyāśaṅkya”anavakāśāḥ āyādayaḥ”'gopāyati' ityādāvapi śap syādiḥ prapnoti/
GS24paribhsu:857: na ca sati śapyasati vā na viśeṣaḥ/ anyādidānīmidamucyate--nāsti viśeṣa
GS24paribhsu:858: iti/ yaduktam”āyādīnāṃ syādibhiravyāpto 'vakāśa iti sa nāstyavakāśa”iti
GS24paribhsu:865: vaiyarthyāpatteśca/ tathā prathamadvirvacanasya taduttaraṃ sāvakāśenāpi dvitīyadvirvacanena bādhaḥ/ yathā vā'derapi pravṛtyā caritārthena 'ādeḥ
GS24paribhsu:867: taduktam”midaco 'ntyāt”iti sūtre bhāṣye”satyapi sambhave bādhanaṃ bhavati”iti/ anyathā”brāmhaṇebhyo dadhi dīyatām, takraṃ
GS24paribhsu:868: kauṇḍinyāya”ityatra takradānena dadhidānasya bādho na syāt/ taddanottaraṃ tatpūrvaṃ vā taddanasya cāritārthyasambhavāt/ ata eva viṣayabhede
GS24paribhsu:870: ata evācirādeśena nuṭo 'pyapavādatvāt bādhamāśaṅkya 'na tisṛ' iti jñāpakena samāhitam”tṛjvat” sūtre bhāṣye/ tena viṣayabhede 'pavādatvābhāva
GS24paribhsu:871: eva bodhyata iti kaścit, tanna ; vinmatorlukā ṭilopamātrasya bādhānāpatteḥ/
GS24paribhsu:876: candrikākāreṇa dhṛtatvāt, siddhānta kaunudyāṃ bhaṭṭoji dīkṣitenāpi
GS24paribhsu:878: tasya bādhako bhavati ityevātra paribhāṣārūpeṇa paṭhyate//
GS24paribhsu:879: yattu 'dayaterdigi' iti sūtre dvitvottaraṃ digyādeśasya cāritārthyaṃ kaiyaṭenoktam, tat
GS24paribhsu:881: “asambhava eva bādhakatvam, virodhasya tadbījatvāt”iti vārtikamataṃ tu bhāṣyakṛtā dūṣitatvānna
GS24paribhsu:882: “takrakauṇḍinya”nyāyopi tadaprāptiyogye 'caritārthaviṣayo vidheyaviṣaya eva ceti”taddhiteṣvacāmādeḥ” “dhātorekācaḥ”ityādi sūtreṣu bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:883: kvacittu sarvathānavakāśatvādeva bādhakatvam/ yathā ṅerāmo yāḍādibādhakatvam/ na hi yāḍādiṣu kṛteṣu ṅerām prapnoti, nirdiśyamānasya
GS24paribhsu:884_0: vyavadhānāt / tatra svasya pūrvaṃ pravṛttirityeva teṣāṃ bādhaḥ / tatra bādhake pravṛtte
GS24paribhsu:884_1: yadyutsargaprāptirbhavati tadā bhavatyeva / yathā tatraiva yāḍāgamaḥ / aprāptau tu
GS24paribhsu:884_2: na, yathā 'paceyuḥ' ityādau dīrghavādhake niravakāśa iyādeśe dīrghābhāvaḥ //
GS24paribhsu:889_0: nagaṇerītvamapavādatvāddhalādiḥśeṣaṃ bādhate / kiṃ tarha? anavakāśatvāditi granthena
GS24paribhsu:889_1: gaṇarūpābhyāsāntyaṇasyetvamityarthe halādiḥśeṣa tannivṛttau tadanavakāśam, ītve tu
GS24paribhsu:890: abhyāsavikāreṣu bādhyabādhakabhāvābhāvena ca sādhitam/ tasmiṃśca sati lope
GS24paribhsu:892: na ca 'yena nāprāpti' nyāyenāpavādatvamapyasya suvacam, tasya caritārthaviṣayatāyā uktatvāt/
GS24paribhsu:893: “iko jhal”ityatra bhāṣyepi dhvanitametat/ tatra hi 'ajjhana' iti dīrdheṇa guṇottaraṃ phalābhāvenānavakāśatvād guṇo bādhite dīrghottaraṃ guṇaḥ syāt,
GS24paribhsu:894: dīrghavidhānaṃ tu minoterdīrdhe kṛte”sani mīmā”ityatra mīgrahaṇena
GS24paribhsu:904: svetareṇetyarthaḥ, tadā sva viṣaye svataradyadyat prāpnoti tad bādhyam,
GS24paribhsu:908: yadi tu yenetyasya lakṣaṇenetyarthaḥ, kāryeṇetyartho vā tadā
GS24paribhsu:909: bādhyaviśeṣacintā/ anavakāśatvena bādhe 'pyetadbādhena sārthakyam, uta tadbādhenetyevaṃ viśeṣacintā sambhavati, yadyudāharaṇamasti//
GS24paribhsu:910: tatra kāryeṇetyarthe pararūpatvavacchinne kātya ārabhyamāṇāyā vṛddhestadbādhakatve na nirṇīte kiṃ śāstravihitasyetyevaṃ tadviśeṣacintāyāmāha --
GS24paribhsu:911: purastādapavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante, nottarān // Paribh_59 //
GS24paribhsu:912_0: avaśyaṃ svaparasmin bādhanīye prathamopasthitānantarabādhena cāritārthye paścādupasthitasya
GS24paribhsu:912_1: tataḥ parasya bādhe mānābhāva ākāṅkṣāyā nivṛttervipratiṣedhaśāstrabādhe mānābhāvāccetyetasya
GS24paribhsu:915: madye 'pavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante, nottarān // Paribh_60 //
GS24paribhsu:916: tenauṣṭhādiṣu pañcasu”asaṃyogopadhāt”iti pratiṣedha eva bādhyate, na tu sahanañvidyamānalakṣaṇa iti “nāsikodara”itytra bhāṣye spaṣṭam/ pūrvopasthita bādhena nairākāṅkṣyamasyā
GS24paribhsu:918_2: ata uktanyāyamūlakamevāha anantarasya vidhirvā bhavati pratiṣedho veti // Paribh_61 //
GS24paribhsu:924: pratyāsattimūlako 'yam/ lakṣyānurodhātta vyavasthetyapi pakṣāntaram/ tatra tatra kvacit svaritatvapratijñānāt, sāmarthyena vā bādhyate 'yaṃ nyāyaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:925: yathā”ṭiḍiḍhā”iti sūtreṇa ḍāpāvyavahitasyāpi ṅīpo vidhiḥ/”na ṣaṭ”ityādinā
GS24paribhsu:926: dvayorapi ṭābṅīpoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/ iyañca”śi sarvanāmasthānam”ityādau bhāṣye spaṣṭetyanyatra
GS24paribhsu:927: nanu dadhatītyādāvantaraṅgatvādantādeśe 'lvidhau, sthānivatvābhāvādādeśo na syāditi tadvaiyarthyāpattiḥ, ata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:929: lakṣaṇaikacakṣuṣako hyapavādaviṣayaṃ paryālocya tadviṣayatvābhāvaniṣcaya utsargeṇa tattallakṣyaṃ saṃskaroti/ anyathā vikalpāpattirityarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:931: caritārthaḥ' iti nyāyasya tu nātra praptiḥ, antādeśaprāptiviṣaye
GS24paribhsu:933: lakṣyaikacakṣuṣkastu tacchāstra paryālocanaṃ vināpyapavādaviṣayaṃ parityajyotsargeṇa lakṣyaṃ
GS24paribhsu:937: parityajyetyarthaḥ/ ata eva prātipadikārtha sūtre bhāṣye”idaṃ dvayapyuktvā na kadācittāvadutsargo bhavati, apavādaṃ
GS24paribhsu:941: yattvabhyastasaṃjñāsūtre kaiyaṭena prakalpya ceti pratīkamupādāya yathā
GS24paribhsu:942: 'na samprasāraṇa iti parasya yaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ samprasāraṇam, pūrvasya tu tannimittakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ' ityuktam, tattu tata utsarga
GS24paribhsu:946: yatra tvapavādo niṣiddhaḥ, tatrāpavādaviṣaye 'pyutsargaḥ pravartata eva/
GS24paribhsu:949: pravartate/ ata eva”tau sat' ityādi saṅgacchate/ ata eva nirdeśād
GS24paribhsu:952_0: atra 'devadattasya hantari hate devadattasyonmajjanaṃ na' iti nyāyasya viṣaya eva
GS24paribhsu:952_1: nāsti / hate devadatta unmajjanaṃ na devadattahananodyatasya, hanane tu bhavatyevonmajjanam /
GS24paribhsu:953: kintu hananodyamasajātīyaṃ prasakti mātram, prasaktasyaiva niṣedhāt/
GS24paribhsu:955: spaṣṭañcadam”śeṣādvibhāṣā”iti sūtre bhāṣye/ tatra hi 'śeṣagrahaṇamanarthakam, ye pratipadaṃ vidhīyante te bādhakā bhaviṣyanti'
GS24paribhsu:956: ityāśaṅkya, 'anavakāśā hi vidhayo bādhakā bhavanti samāsāntāśca kababhāve
GS24paribhsu:958: kvacidanavakāśatvābhāve 'pi paranityādisamavadhāne śīghropasthitikatvena pūrvapravṛttiprayajakaṃ balavatvaṃ pratipadavidhitvenāpi,
GS24paribhsu:961: ata eva 'rame' ityādaupratipadoktatvāt pūrvametva ākārapraśleṣāddhalṅyādilopo na prāpnotītyāśaṅkya”eṅhrasvāt”iti
GS24paribhsu:969_0: yattvāgamādeśayorna bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ, bhinnaphalatvāt, ata eva 'brāmhaṇebhyo dadhi
GS24paribhsu:969_1: dīyatām, kambalaḥ kauṇḍinyāya' ityādau kambaladānena na dadhidānabādha iti”chvoḥ”iti
GS24paribhsu:975: ityatra nuki kṛte 'najantatvād dīrghāprāptyā tadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameva/
GS24paribhsu:978: ādye sanvadbhāvasya paratvaddīrgheṇa bādhaḥ prāpnoti/ antye”mānbadha”iti
GS24paribhsu:981: pravṛttistatraivedamityataḥ”eka”iti sūtre kaiyaṭaḥ, tanna ; nuki kṛte itvāprāptyā”guṇo
GS24paribhsu:983: nanu taccholāditṛnviṣaye ṇvulapi syāt/ na ca tṛnnapavādaḥ,
GS24paribhsu:986: ṇvuli siddhe”nindahiṃsa”ādisūtreṇaikājbhyo vuñvidhānamatra jñāpakam/ tatra ṇvulvuñoḥ svare
GS24paribhsu:987: tācchīlikeṣviti viṣayasaptamī/ tena tācchīlikairatācchīlikaiśca vāsarūpavidhirneti bodhyam/
GS24paribhsu:991: nanvevam 'hasitaṃ chātrasya hasanam' ityādau ghañ, 'icchati bhoktum'
GS24paribhsu:993: 'īṣatpānaḥ somo bhavatā' ityatra khal prāpnotītyata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:995: idañca vāsarūpavidheranityatvāt siddham/ tadanityatve jñapakaṃ ca 'arhe
GS24paribhsu:997: tatra hi cakārasamuccitaliṅā kṛtyatṛcorbādho mā bhūditi kṛtyatṛjgrahaṇaṃ kriyata ityanyatra vistaraḥ/ “vāsarūpa”sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭā//
GS24paribhsu:998: nanu”śvaḥ paktā”ityatra vāsarūpavidhinā lṝḍapi prāpnoti, kṛte ādeśe vairūpyādata āha :-
GS24paribhsu:1001_0: ca”haśaśvatorlaṅca”iti laṅ vidhānaṃ jñāpakam / anyathā”parokṣe liṭ”iti liṭā laṅaḥ
GS24paribhsu:1001_1: samāveśo 'sārūpyāt siddha iti kiṃ laṅvidhānena? śatrādibhistiṅāṃ samāveśārthaṃ śatṛvidhāyake
GS24paribhsu:1002: vāgrahaṇaṃ ca kṛtam/ tajjñapayati”vāsarūpa”sūtre 'pavāda ādeśatvānākrāntaḥ pratyaya eva gṛhyata iti kaiyaṭādau dhvanitam/ tatphalaṃ tu sadādibhyo
GS24paribhsu:1003: bhūtasāmānye liṭaḥ kvasureva, na tu pakṣe tiṅiti bodhyam//
GS24paribhsu:1004: nanu”ṅamo hrasvāt”ityādau ṅamaḥ parasyāco 'ci parato ṅama iti veti sandehaḥ syāt, ata āha
GS24paribhsu:1006: acīti saptamīnirdeśasya”mayauño”ityuttaratra cāritārthyāt pañcamīnirdeśo 'navakāśa iti”tasmādityuttarasya”ityasyaiva pravṛttiḥ/ yatra tu”ḍaḥ si
GS24paribhsu:1011: caritārtheti spaṣṭam”tasminniti”iti sūtre bhāṣye kaiyaṭe ca//
GS24paribhsu:1012: iti śrī nāgeśabhaṭṭaviracite paribhāṣenduśekhare bādhabījanāmakaṃ dvitīyaṃ prakaraṇam//
GS24paribhsu:1014: nanu”ataḥ kṛkami”iti satvam 'ayaskumbhī' ityatra na syāt
GS24paribhsu:1017: sāmānyarūpeṇa viśeṣarūpeṇa vā prātipadikabodhakaśabdagrahaṇe sati liṅgabodhaka pratyaya viśiṣṭasyāpi tena grahaṇaṃ bodhyam/ apinā
GS24paribhsu:1020: strīliṅgaśramaṇādiśabdapāṭhaḥ/ strīpratyayaviśiṣṭaśramaṇādibhiśca kumārīśabdasyaiva sāmānādhikaraṇyam, na tu kumāraśabdasyeti
GS24paribhsu:1025: samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇeṣu ca na pravartata iti ṅyāp sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:1027: tatra samāsāntavidhāvayavagrahaṇa eva na, samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇe tu pravartata eva, svaravidhāveva samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇe tatra
GS24paribhsu:1031: nanvevam”bahuvrīherūdhasoṅīṣ”iti sūtrastha bhāṣyāsaṅgatiḥ/ tatra hi 'kuṇḍodhnī' ityatra”nadyṛtaśca”iti kabāpādito nadyantabahuvrīherityarthāt,
GS24paribhsu:1032: nadyantasya bahuvrīhitvābhāvāt tadasaṅgatiḥ/ nadyantānāṃ yaḥ samāsa
GS24paribhsu:1034_0: nadyantaprakṛtikasubantottarapadakaḥ samāsa iti cet, na ; anayā paribhāṣayā strīpratyaya
GS24paribhsu:1034_1: samabhivyāhāre tadrahite dṛṣṭānāṃ prātipadikatva tadvyāpya dharmāṇāṃ viśiṣṭe 'pi
GS24paribhsu:1039: spaṣṭā ceyam”yuvoranākau”ityatra bhāṣye/ ghaṭaghaṭīgrahaṇena liṅgaviśiṣṭaparibhāṣayā anityatvāt
GS24paribhsu:1046: bhāṣye spaṣṭam/ ata eva”ākaḍāra”sūtre eketi caritārthamityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1047: nanu”bhaśādibhyo bhuvyacveḥ”ityādau vidhīyamānaḥ kyaṅ 'kva divā bhṛśā bhavanti' ityatrāpi syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1049: nañyuktamiva yuktaṃ ca yat kiñcid dṛśyate tatra tasmād bhinne tatsadṛśe
GS24paribhsu:1050_0: 'dhikaraṇe dravye kāryaṃ vijñāyate / hi yataḥ tathārthagatirasti / na hi 'abrahmaṇamānaya'
GS24paribhsu:1050_1: ityukte loṣṭamānīya kṛtī bhavati / ataścavyantabhinne cvyantasadṛśe 'bhūtatadbhāvaviṣaye
GS24paribhsu:1052_1: jñāpakamiti vadantaḥ parāstāḥ, anityatve bhāṣyasammata phalābhāvāt / ata eva 'akartari
GS24paribhsu:1052_2: ca' iti sūtre kāraka grahaṇaṃ bhāṣye pratyākhyātamiti bodhyam / spaṣṭā ceyam”bhṛśādibhyaḥ”iti
GS24paribhsu:1056: nanu 'vyāghrī, kaccapī' ityādau subantena samāsāt tato 'pyantaraṅgatvāṭṭāp
GS24paribhsu:1057: adantatvābhāvājjāti lakṣaṇo ṅīṣ na syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1060_1: ityarthāt tayoḥ sūtrayoḥ supsupetyasya nivṛtyaikadeśānumatyā kārakāṃśe ca siddheyam /
GS24paribhsu:1063: anye tvanityatve na mānam, tatrājāditvāṭṭābityāhuḥ/ ata eva 'kumbhakāraḥ'
GS24paribhsu:1064: ityādau ṣaṣṭhī samāso 'pi subutpatteḥ pūrvameva/ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsābhāve copapadasamāsakṛta ekārthībhāva iti na tatra vākyamiti bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:1065: tatra hi 'ṣaṣṭhīsamāsādupapadasamāso vipratiṣedhena' iti vārttikam/ athavā
GS24paribhsu:1066: 'vibhāṣā ṣaṣṭhī samāso yadā na ṣaṣṭhīsamāsastadopapadasamāsaḥ' iti tatpratyākhyānaṃ ca/
GS24paribhsu:1070: sāmānyataḥ kārakopādānena kārakavibhaktyantena kṛdbhiḥ samāsamātrasya subutpatteḥ pūrvameva
GS24paribhsu:1071: etenaiṣā kārakatadviśeṣayorupādāna eveti parāstam/ asyā vidhyekavākyatvābhāvena vipratiṣedhādi
GS24paribhsu:1073: nanu”ugidacām”ityatra dhātoścedugitkāryaṃ tarhyañcatereveti niyamenādhātoreva numi siddhe 'dhātugrahaṇaṃ vyartham, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1084: 'sarvādīni, jakṣatyādayaḥ' iti codāharaṇe/ sarvanāmasaṃjñā sūtre bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:1086: nanu”vadaḥ supi kyap ca”iti cenānukṛṣṭasya yataḥ”bhuvo
GS24paribhsu:1089: ṇamulyanuvartamāne”avyaye 'yathābhipreta”iti sūtre punarṇamulgrahaṇanasyā jñāpakam/ anyathā 'ktvā ca' iti vadet/
GS24paribhsu:1091: idamanityam/ ata eva”tṛtīyā ca hoḥ”ityatra cānukṛṣṭāyā api dvitīyāyā”antarāntareṇa”ityatra
GS24paribhsu:1095: hi”dvigoḥ ṣṭhaṃśca”iti sūtrāt ṣṭhanaḥ, tatra 'cenāpyanukṛṣṭasya kho
GS24paribhsu:1096: 'nyatarasyām' ityasya cānuvṛttiṃ svīkṛtya lukkhau ceti bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:1098: nanvanudāttāderantodāttācca yaducyate tadvyañjanādervyañjanāntācca na prāpnotītyata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1113: nanvevamapi 'rājadṛṣat' itiyādau”samāsasya”ityantodāttatvaṃ ṣakārākārasya na syāt, ata āha
GS24paribhsu:1116: ityatrādirnakāro na svarayogyaḥ, yaścākārastadyogyo nāsāvādiriti sa
GS24paribhsu:1118: na cādireva makāra udāttaguṇaviśiṣṭāntaratamājrūpo 'stviti vācyam, tathā sati nimittabhūtadvayackatvasyavināśādupajīvyavirodhenādyudāttatvāprāpteḥ,
GS24paribhsu:1119: ityanyatra vistaraḥ/ spaṣṭā ceyam”samāsasya”iti sūtre bhāṣye//
GS24paribhsu:1120: nanu”pūraṇa guṇa”iti niṣedhastavyatyapi syāt”diva aut”itiyautvaṃ diveḥ kvipyapi syāt, tathā”yato 'nāvaḥ”iti svaro ṇyatyapi syāt”ṛdṛśo 'ṅi
GS24paribhsu:1129: tanmātrānubandhakagrahaṇe sa cānyaścānubandho yasya tadgrahaṇaṃ netyantyārthaḥ/ ete ca pratyayāpratyayasādhāraṇe, diva aut”ityādau
GS24paribhsu:1132_0: yenānubandhena sānubandhakatvaṃ dvyanubandhakatvādi vā tadanuccāraṇe evaiṣā, dharmigrāhakamānāt /
GS24paribhsu:1132_1: tena”jaśśasoḥ”ityatra naiṣeti niranubandhakatvāt taddhitaśata evātra grahaṇaṃ syāditi
GS24paribhsu:1135: ekānubandhakagrahaṇe sambhavatīti tvartho na bhāṣyādisammata ityanyatra
GS24paribhsu:1137: nanu 'kuṭīraḥ' ityādau svārthikatvāt svārthikānāṃ prakṛtito liṅgavatanānuvṛtternyāyaprāptatvāt puṃstvānupapattiḥ, 'apkalpam' ityatra napaṃsakaikavacanayoranupapattiścetyata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1140: anyathā”karmavyatihāre ṇac striyām”iti striyāmeva vidhānāt kiṃ tena?
GS24paribhsu:1145: “prateraṃśvādayastatpuruṣe”ityantodāttatvāyāṃśvādiṣu rājame śabdapāṭho 'syā jñāpakaḥ/ anyathā ṭacaṃvāntodāttatve siddhe kiṃ tena?”dvitribhyāṃ
GS24paribhsu:1147: nanu 'śatāni' ityādau numi kṛte ṣaṭsaṃjñā prāpnoti, tataśca luk syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1151: sannipātaḥudvayoḥ sambandhaḥ, tannimitto vidhistaṃ sannipātaṃ yo vihanti,
GS24paribhsu:1154: ata evātra sannipātaśabdena na pūrvaparayoḥ sambandha eva, kintu viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇa sannipāto 'pi gṛhyate/ ata eva 'grāmaṇi kulam' ityādau napuṃsakahrasvatve 'pi”piti kṛti”iti tuk na/
GS24paribhsu:1160_1: ityetatparibhāṣā doṣanirūpaṇāvasare vārtikakṛtoktam, -- 'na hi pratyayaḥ pūrva para
GS24paribhsu:1160_2: sannipāta nimittakaḥ, sa eva ca sannipāta śabdena gṛhyata iti matvā na
GS24paribhsu:1161: pratyayaḥ sannipātanimittakaḥ iti śaṅkāyāṃ tadabhyupetyaivāṅgasaṃjñā tarhyanimittaṃ syādityekadeśinoktam' iti na tadbhāṣyavirodhaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1162: kiñcaivaṃ 'śaivaḥ, gārgāyaḥ, vainateyaḥ' ityādāvapyaṅgasaṃjñāyā lopanimittatvānāpatyā varṇāśraya ityasya vaiyarthayam/
GS24paribhsu:1164: sambhavatīti”kṛnmejantaḥ”ityatra”hrasvasya piti”iti sūtrecaikadeśinā tayā paribhāṣāyā tug vārito bhāṣye/
GS24paribhsu:1169: nanvevam 'rāmāya' ityādau”supi ca”iti dīrghānāpattiḥ, adantāṅgasannipātena jātasya yādeśasya
GS24paribhsu:1170: na ca yañāditvasāpekṣadīrghasya bahiraṅgatayāsiddhatvānnātra sannipātavighāta iti vācyam, āropitāsiddhatve 'pi vastutastadvighātasya
GS24paribhsu:1172: kiñcāntaraṅge kartavye bahiraṅgasyāsiddhatve 'pi tatra kṛte tasyāsiddhatve
GS24paribhsu:1176: sannipātasyāśāstrīyatvānnātra sthānivatvamiti cet, tarhyatrāsiddhatvamapi kathamiti vibhāvya, 'aśāstrīye 'siddhatvāpravṛtteḥ'”īdūdet”iti sūtre kaiyaṭena spaṣṭamuktatvāt/
GS24paribhsu:1179: yayoḥ sannipātasya vighātakaṃ śāstram, tayoḥ sannipātanimittakavidhāvupādānamapekṣitamiti tu nāgrahaḥ/ ata eva 'dākṣiḥ'
GS24paribhsu:1180: ityatrākārāntaprakṛtīñsannipātanimittāṅgasaṃjñānayā paribhāṣayāllopasya nimittaṃ na syādityāśaṅkyānityatvena samāhitam,”kṛnmejantaḥ”iti sūtre
GS24paribhsu:1182: na ca 'kumbhakārebhyaḥ, ādhaye' ityādāvavyayasaṃjñāyā anayā paribhāṣayā
GS24paribhsu:1184: tiḥ/ anayā paribhāṣayā lug mābhūt, avyayatvaṃ tu syādeva/ lukā hi tadīyasannipātasya vighātaḥ, nāvyayasaṃjñayā/ saṃjñāphalaṃ tvakac syāditi
GS24paribhsu:1190: lugekavākyatāpannā tu na guṇādito 'ntaraṅgā, ubhayorapi śabdataḥ subāśrayatvāt/
GS24paribhsu:1192: ceyaṃ”kṛnmejantaḥ”iti sūtre bhāṣye/ asyā anityatve phalāni bhāṣye parigaṇitāni - varṇāśrayaḥ, pratyayaḥ varṇavicālasyānimittam,
GS24paribhsu:1197: nadīhrasvatvaṃ sambuddhilopasya - 'nadi, kumāri' ityādi/ yādeśo dīrghatvasya -
GS24paribhsu:1198: kaṣṭāya/ ito 'nyatra pravṛttireva, 'doṣāḥ khalvapi sākalyena parigaṇtāḥ'
GS24paribhsu:1201: luki”lukstaddhita” iti strīpratyayalukyānukaḥ śravaṇāpattiḥ, ata āha -
GS24paribhsu:1203: atra ca”bilvakādibhyaśchasya luk”iti sūtrasthaṃ chagrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam/
GS24paribhsu:1204: taddhi chamātrasya lugbodhana dvārā kuko 'nivṛttiryathā syādityartham/
GS24paribhsu:1205: kṛta kugāgamānaḍādyantargatā bilvādaya eva tatra nirdiṣṭā
GS24paribhsu:1207: nacaivamapi chagrahaṇaṃ vyartham, kṛta kugāgamānuvādasāmarthyādeva tadanivṛttisiddheḥ, anyathā”bilvādibhyaḥ”ityeva vadet/
GS24paribhsu:1208: lakṣaṇapratipadoktaparibhāṣayā bilvādipuraskāreṇa vihitapratyayasyaiva lugvidhānānnātiprasaṅga iti vācyam, tato 'pi
GS24paribhsu:1211: anyathā 'etayati' ityādau ṭilopenaiva ṅīpi nivṛtte 'sanniyogaśiṣṭa' paribhāṣayā tasyāpi nivṛtyā
GS24paribhsu:1216: nanu 'curā śīlamasyāḥ sā caurī'ityādau śīlam”chatrādibhyo ṇaḥ”iti ṇe ṅīp na prāpnotītyata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1222: praharaṇam”iti ṇe 'dāṇḍā' ityeva/”kārmaḥ”iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭā//
GS24paribhsu:1226: 'dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatpratyaye kāryavijñānam' iti pāṭhastu 'prasṛḍbhiḥ' ityādau”anudāttasya cardupadhasya”ityāmāpādanena bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:1232: nanu 'sarvake, iccakaiḥ' ityādau sarvanāvyayasaṃjñe na syātām, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1235: 'tadekadeśabhūtaṃ tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate' iti”yena vidhiḥ”iti sūtre bhāṣye pāṭhaḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1236: nanu”gātisthāghupābhūbhyaḥ”iti sico luk 'apāsīta' ityādau pāterapi syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1239: asyāñca jñāpakaḥ”svarati sūti”iti sūtre sūṅiti vaktavye sūtisūyatyoḥ pṛthaṅnirdeśa iti
GS24paribhsu:1242: dhvanitā ceyaṃ paribhāṣā”yasya vibhāṣā”ityatra bhāṣye/ tatra hi 'viditaḥ'
GS24paribhsu:1245: ityuktam/ tatra co hetau, yato 'yaṃlugvikaraṇaḥ, ato viśisāhacaryācchavikaraṇasya grahaṇam, na tu hanisāhacaryādasyāpi,
GS24paribhsu:1247: ata eva paribhāṣāyāṃ lugvikaraṇasyaiveti noktam/ kaṇṭhatastu bhāṣye eṣā
GS24paribhsu:1248_0: kvāpi na paṭhitā / 'gātisthā' iti sūtre 'pibatergrahaṇam kartavyam' iti vārtikakṛtā
GS24paribhsu:1249: nanu 'prajighāyayiṣati' ityādau”heracaṅi”iti vidhīyamānaṃ kutvaṃ na syāt ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1251: acaṅīti pratiṣedha evāsyā jñāpakaḥ/ iyaṃ ca kutva viṣayaiva/”heracaṅi”iti
GS24paribhsu:1253: nanu 'yuṣmabhyam' ityādau 'bhyasaḥ' ityatra bhyamiti cchede bhyaso bhyami kṛte 'ntyalope etvaṃ syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1255: aṅge 'ṅgādhikāre vṛttamuniṣpannaṃ yatkāryam, tasmin sati punaranyasyāṅgakāryasya vṛttau pravṛttāvavidhānaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1257: dīrgheṇa ca siddhe tadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameva/ ata eva”jñājanorjā”
GS24paribhsu:1258_0: “jyādādīyasaḥ”iti sūtrayorenāṃ jñāpayitvā kiṃ prayojanamiti praśne pibaterguṇapratiṣedha
GS24paribhsu:1258_1: uktaḥ, sa na vaktavyaḥ, ityeva prayojanamuktam, na tu lakṣyasiddhirūpam / taduktam”bhyaso
GS24paribhsu:1259: cchedaḥ,”śeṣe lopaḥ”cāntyalopa eva”ato guṇe”iti pararūpeṇa siddham 'yuṣmabhyam' ityanyatra
GS24paribhsu:1260: evañca sūtradvayasthametajjñāpanaparaṃ bhāṣyam”bhyaso bhyam”iti sūtrasthaṃ ca bhāṣyamekadeśyuktirityāhuḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1263: idañca vidheyakoṭau saṃjñāpūrvakatva eva/ 'tena svāyambhuvam' ityādi
GS24paribhsu:1268: tathā tanādipāṭhādeva siddhe”tanādikṛñbhyaḥ”iti sūtre kṛñ grahaṇāt --
GS24paribhsu:1274: tathā vinārtha nañā samāsena”anudāttam padamanekam”ityeva siddhe varjagrahaṇāt --
GS24paribhsu:1276: tena”neyaṅuvaṅ”ityasyānityatvāt 'he subhru' iti siddhamiti, tat, na;
GS24paribhsu:1281: āḍgrahaṇaṃ tu loḍgrahaṇavaditi bodhyam/ ata eva”ghorlopo liṭi vā”it sūtre veti pratyākhyātam/ lope 'pyāṭpakṣe āṭaḥ śravaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati -- 'dadhāt'
GS24paribhsu:1286: tanādi sūtre kṛñgrahaṇasya bhāṣye pratyākhyānācca/ cakṣiṅo ṅakārasyānteditvābhāvasampādanena
GS24paribhsu:1292: yadapi -- nanu hanterayaṅlukyāśīrliṅi vadhādeśo na syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1295: ata eva juhudhītyadau dvitve kṛte dhitvasiddhiriti/ tadapi na, bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:1298: ata eva”dayaderdigi”iti sūtre 'steḥ paratvād dvitve kṛte
GS24paribhsu:1299: parasyāsterbhūbhāve pūrvasya śravaṇaṃ prāpnotītyāśaṅkya viṣayasapmyāśrayaṇena parihṛtaṃ bhāṣye/
GS24paribhsu:1300: anyathā tvaduktarītyā 'ekājdvirvacana' nyāyena samudāyasyaivādeśāpattau tadasaṅgatiḥ spaṣṭaiva/
GS24paribhsu:1303: bobhūtviti niyama iti na tadvirodhaḥ/ tasmāddhanteryaṅluki 'vadhyāt'
GS24paribhsu:1308: anūdyamāna viśeṣaṇeṣu tanniyāmikā paribhāṣā nopatiṣṭata ati tadarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1310: tadviśeṣeṇavyavasthāpakatvena caritārthānāṃ tadviśeṣeṇavyavasthāpakatve mānābhāva iti tarkamūleyam/
GS24paribhsu:1311: kiñca”udīcāmātaḥ sthāne”iti sūtre sthāne grahaṇamasyā liṅgam/
GS24paribhsu:1313: iti paribhāṣayaiva tallābhe tadvaiyarthyaṃ spaṣṭameveti, tat,
GS24paribhsu:1317: paribhāṣālabhya ityarthasya”ṣaṣṭī sthāne”iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭamuktatvena
GS24paribhsu:1325: kārakavibhaktitvañca kriyājanakārthakavibhaktitvam/ tacca prathamāyā apyastīti sāpi kārakavibhaktiriti”sahayukte”ityādisūtreṣu
GS24paribhsu:1327: iyaṃ ca vācanikyeva/ ata eva”yasyaca bhāvena”iti
GS24paribhsu:1329: dīyate”iti sūtre bhāṣye dhvanitam, kaiyaṭena ca spaṣṭamuktam/ etena
GS24paribhsu:1330: 'kriyānvayitvaṃ kārakatvam' ityapāstam, “yasyaca bhāvena”iti saptamyā api kriyānvayitvāt/
GS24paribhsu:1331_2: 'namasyati devān' ityādau caturthī vāraṇāya bhāṣye upanyāsasyāsaṅgateśca //
GS24paribhsu:1333: upapadārthena tu yatkiñcit ktiyākārakamūlakaḥ sambandha iti tannimittā
GS24paribhsu:1335: kriyākārakābhāve naivānvayāt/ atra ca namaḥ padārthasyāpi kriyātvaṃ muṇḍayatau muṇḍasyeva/
GS24paribhsu:1336: “sahayukte”ityādau ca pradhāne prathamā sādhanārthamiyaṃ bhāṣya upanyastetyanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1337: nanu 'adamuyaṅ' ityādau pūrvasyāpi muktvāpattiḥ, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1339: anantyasadeśānanyasadeśayorekaprayoge yugapatprāptavantyasadeśasyaveti tadarthaḥ/ anyathā dhātvādernatvasatve'netā' 'sotā' ityādāveva syātām, na tu 'namati' 'siñcati' ityādau/
GS24paribhsu:1341: antyena samāno deśo yasya so 'ntyasadeśaḥ/ tatvaṃ cāntyavarṇatadvarṇayoritarāvyavadhānena
GS24paribhsu:1342: ata eva vidhdha ityādyartham”na samprasāraṇe”iti caritārtham/
GS24paribhsu:1346: na caiṣā”ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam”iti sūtre bhāṣye pratyākhyāteti
GS24paribhsu:1347_1: yānyetasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni, tadarthameṣā kartavyā pratividheyaṃ doṣeṣu,
GS24paribhsu:1348_0: 'mimārjiṣati' ityarthaṃ caiṣā / tatra vṛddheḥ pūrvamantaraṅgatvāt dvitve paratvādabhyāsakārye
GS24paribhsu:1348_1: tato 'bhyāsekārasya vṛddhivāraṇāyāvaśyakī / na ca vṛddhau punarabhyāsahrasvatvena
GS24paribhsu:1353: etasyāḥ prayojanāni' iti pāṭho 'pi kvacid dṛśyate/
GS24paribhsu:1354: vācanikyevaiṣā/ spaṣṭā ca”ṣyaṅaḥ”iti sūtre”adaso 'seḥ”iti sūtre ca 'kecidantyasadeśasya' ityanena bhāṣya ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1361: eṣā”alontyāt”sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭā/ phalānāmanyathāsiddhikaraṇepratyākhyātā ceti tata evāvadhāryatām//
GS24paribhsu:1368: nanu svasrāditvaprayukto mātṛ śabdasya ṅībniṣedhaḥ paricchettṛvācakamātṛśabde 'pi syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1371: tena śuddha rūḍhasya jananīvācakasyaiva grahaṇam, na paricchattṛvācakasya/
GS24paribhsu:1372: 'yogajabodhe tadanāliṅgitaśuddharūḍhajopasthitiḥ pratibandhikā' iti vyutpattireva tadbījam/ rathakārādhikaraṇanyāyasiddho 'yamarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1373: kaścittu”dīdhīvevīṭām”ityatrānayā paribhāṣayā dīdhīvevīṅoreva grahaṇam, na dīṅdhīṅveñ vīnāmiti, tat, na; tathā sati 'dīvedhīvīṭām' ityeva vadediteyanye//
GS24paribhsu:1374: nanu vātāyanārthe gavākṣe 'vaṅo vaikalpikatvāt 'gokṣaḥ' ityādyapi syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1380: niyame hyaśrutāyā anyanivṛtteḥ sāmarthyāt parikalpanamuktānuvādadoṣaśceti lāghavād vidhireveti bodhyam/”yasya halaḥ”ityatra”ijādeḥ sanumaḥ”ityādau
GS24paribhsu:1382: nanu”āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtavacca”ityanena luṅa iva laṅliṭorapyatideśaḥ syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1386: lyapi”iti liṅgāt/ tena sthānivatsūtreṇa viśeṣātideśo 'pi/ spaṣṭaṃ
GS24paribhsu:1388: nanu”titsvaritam”iti svaritatvam 'cikīrṣati' ityādau syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1390: iyaṃ ca”aṅgasya”iti sūtr bhāṣye paṭhitā/ varṇagrahaṇe ca na pravartata iti tatraiva kaiyaṭe spaṣṭam/ ata eva”sanāṃśabhikṣa uḥ”“vale”ityatra sanvalayoḥ
GS24paribhsu:1392: pare tu”titsvaritam”iti sūtra eṣā paribhāṣā lakṣyasaṃskārāya bhāṣye kvāpi
GS24paribhsu:1400: tena viśabdasāhacaryādupasargasyaiva parāśabdasya grahaṇamiti tatraiva bhāṣye spaṣṭam/ sahacaraṇaṃ sadṛśayoreveti sahacaritaśabdena
GS24paribhsu:1402: sadṛśayoreva sahavivakṣā, tayoreva sahaprayoga ityutsargācca/ dhvanitaṃ
GS24paribhsu:1404_1: 'yadyapyayaṃ parirdṛṣṭāpacāro varjane cāvarjane ca, ayaṃ khalvapaśabdo 'dṛṣṭāpacāro
GS24paribhsu:1404_2: varjanārtha eva karmapravacanīyaḥ, tasya ko 'nyaḥ sahāyo bhavitumarhatyanyo varjanārthāt,
GS24paribhsu:1405: iti gaurevānīyate, nāśvaḥ, na gardabhaḥ' ityuktam/ tena hi sadṛśānāmeva
GS24paribhsu:1407: “dvistriścatuḥ”iti sūtre sāhacaryeṇaiva kṛtvor'thasya grahaṇe siddhe kṛtvorthagrahaṇādeṣānityā/ tena”dīdhīvevīṭām”ityatra dhātusāhacarye
GS24paribhsu:1409: nanu”asthi”ityanaṅ 'priyasakthanā brāhmaṇena' ityatra na syāt, aṅgasya
GS24paribhsu:1414: evaṃ ca tatra liṅgamasthyādīnāmeva viśeṣaṇam, nāṅgasya śiśīlugnumvidhiṣu tu gṛhyamāṇasyābhāvāt prakaraṇaprāptaṅgasyaiva viśeṣaṇam/
GS24paribhsu:1415: ata eva”vā napuṃsakasya”iti sūtre”vā śau”iti na kṛtam/ tatra napuṃsakagrahaṇaṃ hi gṛhyamāṇasya śatrantasyaiva napuṃsakatve yathā syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1416: 'bahavo dadato yeṣu tāni kulāni bahudadati' ityatra mā bhūt; 'bahūni
GS24paribhsu:1417: dadanti yeṣu te bahudadantaḥ' ityatra yathā syādityevamartham/ spaṣṭaṃ
GS24paribhsu:1419: kecittu”aco rahābhyaṃ dve”ityatra śrutena rephasya nimittatvena
GS24paribhsu:1420: yarantarbhāvādanumitena kāryitvaṃ bādhyata ityetadudāharaṇamāhuḥ, tat, na;
GS24paribhsu:1423: ityādau syāt, tathā”gātisthāghupābhūbhyaḥ”iti luk 'pai ovai śeṣaṇe'
GS24paribhsu:1424: ityataḥ kṛtātvāt parasyāpi syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1427: tasyaiva grahaṇam, śīgropasthitikatvāt/ dvitīyo hi vilambopasthitikaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1429: vilambopasthitikam/ pibatestu tacchīghropasthitikam/ idameva hyetat paribhāṣābījam/ iyaṃ varṇagrahaṇe 'pi”ot”sūtre bhāṣye sañcāritatvāt/
GS24paribhsu:1430: yattu varṇagrahaṇe naiṣā”ādecaḥ”ityatropadeśagrahaṇāditi, tattu tasminneva sūtre śabdenduśekhare dūṣitamiti tata eva draṣṭavyam/
GS24paribhsu:1433: nanvevaṃ deṅo dodhātośca kṛtātvasya ghusaṃjñā na syāt, tathā meṅa ātve
GS24paribhsu:1437: atra ca jñāpakaṃ daipaḥ pitvam/ taddhi 'adāp' iti sāmānyagrahaṇārtham/
GS24paribhsu:1438: anyathā lākṣaṇikatvādeva vidhau tadgrahaṇe siddhe kiṃ niṣedhe sāmānyagrahaṇārthena pitvena? tena caikadeśānumatidvārā sampūrṇā paribhāṣā
GS24paribhsu:1441: “gātisthā”iti sūtre iṇādeśagāgrahaṇameveṣyata iti na doṣa ityanyatra
GS24paribhsu:1445: nanvevaṃ saṃyogasaṃjñāsamāsasaṃjñābhyastasaṃjñā api pratyekaṃ syuḥ, ā āha --
GS24paribhsu:1447: 'gargāḥ śataṃ daṇḍyantām, arthinaśca rājāno hiraṇyāna bhavanti' ityādau
GS24paribhsu:1449: nanu”yūstriyākhyau”ityatra vyaktipakṣe dīrghanirdeśādanaṇtvena grāhakasūtrāprāptyodāttādyanyatamoccāraṇe 'nyasvarakasya saṃjñā na syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1452: asati yatne svarūpeṇoccārito guṇo na bhedakaḥ, na vivakṣita ityarthaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1453: jātipakṣe tu nāsyopayoga iti bodhyam/ 'yū' ityādau dīrghamātravṛttijātinirdeśānna kṣatirityanyatra
GS24paribhsu:1454: nanu 'sarvanāmāni' ityatra ṇatvābhāvanipātane 'pi loke saṇatvaprayogasya sādhutvaṃ syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1459: purāṇeti pṛṣotarādiḥ purātaneti cetyanye/ iyam”sarvādi”sūtra bhāṣye
GS24paribhsu:1463: bhaviṣyatīti kathamasya jñāpatvamiti vācyam, paramāsthiśabdādābantodātta udāttaguṇakasyāpi sthānivatvena vivakṣāyāṃ mānābhāvāt/
GS24paribhsu:1464: “catasaryādyudāttanipātanaṃ kariṣayate, vadhādeśe ādyudāttanipātanaṃ kariṣayate, padādayo 'ntādāttā nipātyante, sahasya sa udātto
GS24paribhsu:1467: “traisvaryeṇa pāṭhaḥ”iti pakṣe tu jñāpakaparaṃ bhāṣyāmiti kaiyaṭādayaḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1468: pare tu, nipātanaṃ nāmānyādṛśe prayoge prāpte 'nyādṛśaprayogakaraṇam,
GS24paribhsu:1470: dvandvaprayukte 'ntodātte uccāraṇīye ādyudāttoccāraṇam - anyatra sthānyarūpe svara uccāraṇīye tattaduccāraṇaṃ vivakṣārtham/
GS24paribhsu:1471: atra vikārakṛto lakṣyabhedo neti”sici vṛddhiḥ”iti bhāṣyāt pratīyate/
GS24paribhsu:1472: atra ca”asthidadhi”ityādāvanaṅāderudāttasyaivoccāraṇena siddhe udāttagrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam/ svarūpeṇoccārita ityukteranudāttāderantodāttādityudāttādiśabdoccāraṇe vivakṣaiva/
GS24paribhsu:1475: nanūkhadhātordvitve svata eva hrasvatvāt pūrvamabhyāsahrasvāprāptau halādiḥ śeṣe savarṇa dīrghe hrasvāpattiḥ, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1477: evaṃ ca hrasvasyāpi hrasve kṛte 'lakṣye lakṣaṇasya' iti nyāyena na
GS24paribhsu:1479: “iko jhal”iti sūtre bhāṣye -- 'kṛtakāri khalvapi śāstraṃ parjanyavat' iti/
GS24paribhsu:1481: na ca 'lakṣye lakṣaṇasya sakṛdeva pravṛttiḥ' ityatra na mānamiti
GS24paribhsu:1483: punardvitvena ca trisakārasya siddhau”samaḥ suṭi”iti sūtrasyaiva
GS24paribhsu:1487: yadyapyadhyetāra ekaśrutyaivāṅgāni paṭhanti brahmaṇavat, tathāpi vyākhyānato 'nunāsikatvādivadudāttanipātanādijñānamityāhuḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1488: vidheyāṇ viṣaye tu”apratyayaḥ”iti niṣedhānna guṇābhedakatvena savarṇagrahaṇam, ata eva 'ghaṭavat' ityādau matormasya nānunāsiko vakāraḥ/
GS24paribhsu:1496: 'caturbhyaḥ' iti tu spaṣṭārthameva/ ata eva tatpratyakhyānaṃ bhāṣyoktaṃ
GS24paribhsu:1498_0: ata eva savarṇasaṃjñāderniṣedhaviṣaye na vikalpaḥ / anyathā mīmāṃsakarītyā vidherupajīvyatvena
GS24paribhsu:1498_1: prabalyāt tasya sarvathā bādhānupapatyā durvāraḥ sa iti mañjūṣāyāṃ vistaraḥ / ata
GS24paribhsu:1504: yasyārthaḥ prakṛtyā pratyāyyate, so 'pi pratyaya ityasyāpyaṅgīkārāt tasya
GS24paribhsu:1515: spaṣṭameva paṭhitavye 'numānād bodhanamasārvatrikatvārthamityarthaḥ/ tena jñāpakasiddhaparibhāṣāyāniṣṭaṃ nāpādanīyamiti tātparyam/ bhāṣye 'pi
GS24paribhsu:1517: jñāpaketi nyāyasyāpyupalakṣaṇam/ nyāyajñāpakasiddhānāmapi keṣāñcit kathanamanyāṣāmanityatvabodhanāyeti bhāvaḥ/ yathā 'tatsthānāpanne
GS24paribhsu:1518: taddharnalābhaḥ' iti nyāyasiddhaṃ sthānivatsūtram, jñāpakasiddhaṃ ca tatra”analvidhau”iti//
GS24paribhsu:1519: nanu 'drogdhā drogdhā, droḍhā droḍhā' ityādau ghatvādīnāmasiddhatvāt pūrvaṃ dvitve ekatra ghatvam, aparatra ḍhatvamityasyāpyāpattirata āga --
GS24paribhsu:1524: yatra ca siddhatvāsiddhatvayoḥ phale viśeṣaḥ, tatraiveyam/ 'kṛṣṇarddhiḥ'
GS24paribhsu:1525: ityādau jaśtvātpūrvamanantaraṃ vā dvitve rūpe viśeṣābhāvena nāsyāḥ pravṛttirityanyatra vistaraḥ/”sarvasya dve”iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭeyam//
GS24paribhsu:1526: nanu 'goṣvaśveṣu ca svāmī' ityādivat 'goṣvaśvānāṃ ca svāmī' ityapi
GS24paribhsu:1528: ekasyā ākṛteścaritaḥ prayoge dvitīyasyāstṛtīyasyāśca na bhaviṣyati //
GS24paribhsu:1529: yatrānyākṛtikaraṇe bhinnārthatvasambhāvanā tadviṣayo 'yaṃ nyāya ityantra vistaraḥ/”kṛñcānuprayujyate”iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭeyam//
GS24paribhsu:1530: nanu 'vivyādha' ityādau paratvāddhalādiḥśeṣe vasya samprasāraṇaṃ syāt, ata āha --
GS24paribhsu:1531: samprasāraṇaṃ tadāśrayaṃ ca kāryaṃ balavat // Paribh_127 //
GS24paribhsu:1534: syādityarthakatvenedaṃ siddhamityeṣā vyarthā,”liṭyabhyāsasya”iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/ phalāntarānyathāsiddhirapi tatraiva bhāṣye spaṣṭā/”ṇau ca
GS24paribhsu:1535: saṃścaṅoḥ”ityādau saṃścaṅoḥ ityādi viṣayasaptamīti tatrāpi na doṣa
GS24paribhsu:1543: tayornirmūlatvāt, bhāṣyāvyavahṛtatvācca, 'na ca vikṛtiḥ prakṛtiṃ gṛhṇāti'
GS24paribhsu:1547: bhāṣye spaṣṭamuktatvādityanye/ antyāpi tatra tatropadeśagrahaṇaṃ kurvataḥ
GS24paribhsu:1551_0: prayogam, tasmiṃśca laukike prayoge sānubandhakānāṃ prayogo nāstīti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ
GS24paribhsu:1551_1: prayoga upāsyate, 'ka upadeśo nāma' iti ghusaṃjñāsūtrastha bhāṣyeṇa prāyogikāsambhave
GS24paribhsu:1552: bhāṣye sānubandhaketyādi prakṛtābhiprayeṇa/”dādeḥ”iti sūtre dādipadasyaupadeśikadāditvavati lakṣaṇeti na doṣa ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1553: yadapi nanu 'ajarghā bebhidīti' ityādau tattadiguṇaprayuktā vikaraṇā
GS24paribhsu:1554: yaṅluki syuḥ, tathā yaṅluki 'bebhiditā' ityādau”ekācaḥ”itoṇ niṣedhaḥ syāt,
GS24paribhsu:1556: śtipā śapānubandhena nirdiṣṭaṃ yad gaṇena ca /
GS24paribhsu:1557: yatraikājgrahaṇaṃ caiva pañcaitāni na yaṅluki // Paribh_130 //
GS24paribhsu:1559: yāti, vāti,”sanīvanta”iti sūtre bhareti,”dīṅo yuḍaci” “anudātta ṅitaḥ”
GS24paribhsu:1561_1: tena bhaṣbhāvo 'pi 'ajarghāḥ' ityādau bhavati / ata eva”śvoditaḥ”iti sūtre kaiyaṭe
GS24paribhsu:1570: ugantatvamādāya”śruyukaḥ kiti”itīṇ niṣedho na/ tatropadeśe ityanuvṛttiśya 'stīrṇam' ityādāviṇ niṣedhāyetyākare spaṣṭam/
GS24paribhsu:1571: na ca bhāṣye yaṅ lopo 'bebhiditā' ityādāviṭpravṛtyarthamupadeśe
GS24paribhsu:1576_1: loke 'nabhidhānena chandasi sarvavidhīnāṃ vaikalpikatvena ca tatra doṣānupanyāsenādoṣāt /
GS24paribhsu:1576_2: anyathā 'ekājgrahaṇaṃ kimartham' iti praśnasya 'uttaratra jāgartyarthamiha vadhyartham'
GS24paribhsu:1578: na cārdhadhātukākṣiptadhātorekāca iti viśeṣaṇam/ evaṃ ca 'bibhitsati'
GS24paribhsu:1580: etacca 'dayateḥ' iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/ evaṃ ca prakṛtabhāṣyāsaṅgatiriti vācyam ; ākṣepe ākṣiptasyānvaye ca mānābhāvāt/
GS24paribhsu:1581: aṅgatvaṃ tu viśiṣṭa eveti”ekāco dve”iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/ nirūpitaṃ ca tanādiśeṣe śabdenduśekhare/ dhātutvaṃ tūttarakhaṇḍa eva/ ata eva”ekāco
GS24paribhsu:1582: baśo bhaṣ”iti sūtre dhātoravayavasyaikāca iti vaiyadhikaraṇyenānvaye gardhapsiddhiḥ prayojanamuktaṃ bhāṣye, na tu prasiddham 'ajarghāḥ' iti/
GS24paribhsu:1587: bhāṣāyāṃ tu tādṛśānāmabhāva eva/ śtipśabādinirdeśāstu 'bhavateraḥ' ityādi sūtrasthatannirdeśavannārthasādhakā ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1588: nanu 'jabho 'ci, radheśca, neṭyaliṭi' ityeva sūtryatām, kiṃ dvīradhigrahaṇenetyāha --
GS24paribhsu:1591: bhāṣyāsammateyam/”ṭāṅasi”iti sūtrastha bhāṣya viruddhā ca/ tatra ca inādeśe ikārapratyākhyānaṃ yogavibhāgenaiva kṛtamiti bahavaḥ//
GS24paribhsu:1594: tatrānekapadaghaṭitasūtre prāyaḥ padalāghavavicāra eva, na tu mātrālāghavavicāra iti”ūkāloc,”apṛkta ekāl”ityādisūtreṣu bhāṣye dhvanitam/
GS24paribhsu:1595: tatra hi sūtre algrahaṇahalgrahaṇayorviśeṣavicāre saṃjñāyāṃ halgrahaṇam”ṇyakṣatriya”iti sūtre aṇiñoriti vācyamiti trīṇi
GS24paribhsu:1596: padānyalgrahaṇe, tadekaṃ svādilope halgrahaṇam”ṇya”iti sūtre aṇiñoriti na
GS24paribhsu:1597: vācyam, apṛktasyeti vācyamiti trīṇyeva padānīti nāsti lāghavakṛto viśeṣa
GS24paribhsu:1599: “aci śnu”iti sūtre iṇa ityeva siddhe yvoriti saṃmṛdya grahaṇānna
GS24paribhsu:1600: pūrveṇeṇgrahaṇam/ tatra vibhakti nirdeśe saṃmṛdya grahaṇe ca sārdhāstrisro mātrā iṇ grahaṇe tisro mātrā iti laṇsūtre bhāṣyokteḥ, tathā”otaḥ śyani”iti
GS24paribhsu:1602: tatrāyamarthaḥ --”ṣṭhivuklamu”iti sūtre 'śitīti na karttavyaṃ bhavati' iti bhāṣye na kevalaṃ mātrālāghavaṃ yāvadayamapyartha iti kaiyaṭokteḥ prāyeṇeti śivam//
